regex.name: bro.adca.st
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream/$doregex[select].html'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://vipracing.info/channel/canal-2' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('tambor = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] tokenpage = re.findall('firme = "\/(.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http://bro.adca.st/%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall(':"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://bro.adca.st/&Origin=http://bro.adca.st'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['Opcion 248', 'Opcion 15129', 'Opcion 13137', 'Opcion 715', 'Opcion 13525', 'Opcion 10762', 'Opcion 7386', 'Opcion 7387']) lists = ['248', '15129', '13137', '715', '13525', '10762', '7386', '7387'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: bro.adca.st
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream/$doregex[select].html'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://vipracing.info/channel/canal-2' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('tambor = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] tokenpage = re.findall('firme = "\/(.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http://bro.adca.st/%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall(':"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://bro.adca.st/&Origin=http://bro.adca.st'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['24187', '7387', '24187', '21611', '21675', '22612']) lists = ['24187', '7387', '24187', '21611', '21675', '22612'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <title>[makelist.param1] [makelist.param4]</title> <link>http://$doregex[ip]$doregex[m3u8]</link> <regex> <name>ip</name> <expres>redirect=(.*)</expres> <page>http://[makelist.param3]:1935/loadbalancer</page> <referer>www.http://[makelist.param4]</referer> </regex> <regex> <name>m3u8</name> <expres>ea \+ "([^"]+)</expres> <page>http://[makelist.param4]/membedplayer/[makelist.param2]/1/500/400</page> <agent>Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5</agent> <referer>http://www.[makelist.param4]</referer> </regex> <thumbnail>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/blackghostaddon/gray/master/img/deportes.png</thumbnail>

regex.name: bro.adca.st
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://telerium.tv/embed/25018.html'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://maxdeportv.net/?canal=1' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('"(Ly9z.+?)"', source.text)[0] tokenpage = re.findall('"(Ly90ZWxlcml1bS.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http:%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall('"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://telerium.tv/embed/25018.html&Origin=http://telerium.tv'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

itm.itm:
[B]Multicanal WIZHD 10[I] [/I][/B] $doregex[url]
url #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re,requests headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': 'http://schedule.racing/sevenembed.php?id=wiz10&p=0&c=0&stretching=uniform'} url = '$doregex[url2]' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text data1 = re.findall('return\(\[([^\]]+)', source)[0] data2 = re.findall('\+ ([^\.]+).join', source)[0] data2 = re.findall(data2 + ' = \W(.+)\]', source)[0] data1 = ''.join(data1).replace('"','').replace(',', '').replace(' ', '').replace('\/','/') data2 = ''.join(data2).replace('"','').replace(',', '').replace(' ', '').replace('\/','/') data3 = re.findall('getElementById\W"([^"]+)', source)[0] data3 = re.findall(data3 + '\W*(.+?=*)\W', source)[0] return data1 + data2 + data3
url2 src="([^"]+) http://schedule.racing/sevenembed.php?id=wiz10&p=0&c=0&stretching=uniform http://wizhdsports.is/live/stream10.html

#$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): count=re.findall('data-page="\d">(\d).*\n.*?raquo',page_data)[0];pn=1;data=[] while pn <= int(count): page='https://www.myfree-tivi.com/livetv?page='+str(pn);source=requests.get(page).content;list=re.findall('<main.*?>(?s)(.*?)<nav',source)[0].replace(''','\'') data +=re.findall('href="/(.*?)".title="(?!Chaine)(.*?)".*\n.*src="//([^"]+)',list);pn +=1 return data
